channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Kosuru Udit
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Kosuru Udit

item.title: Web Scraping latest COVID-19 updates from different News Websites
item.description: It gathers latest COVID-19 updates from various news websites like CNN,NBC,CNBC . After scrapping the information from different websites it stores in a data frame. Scrapy is used for scrapping the websites. Project Link

item.title: Optical Character Recognition of a Financial document
item.description: It extracts data from a financial document. It uses easyocr to extract the data. Project Link

item.title: Speech to text conversion
item.description: It converts speech into text. Live Streaming Speech is converted into text. Project Link

item.title: Object Detection on Custom Dataset
item.description: It uses Yolo Object Detector. It detects NFPA symbol over images. Project Link

item.title: Image Classification using Transfer learning
item.description: It classifies images of bean dataset. It classifies whether a leaf is infected or not based on learning of pre-trained model. MobileNet is used as a pre-trained model. Project Link

item.title: Forecasting Time Series Data
item.description: It forecasts superstore time series dataset. It compares sales of office and furniture data. It captures trends. Project Link

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact number: 7981585787 E-mail Id : uditkosuru76@gmail.com LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/kosuru-udit-0a0a9a171

item.title: Content based Recommender System
item.description: It is a content based Recommender System. It recommends similar movies based on plot,cast. Project Link

item.title: Creating a Conversational Cricket Chatbot
item.description: It is a rule based cricket Chatbot. Wikipedia article of Cricket is taken as Corpus. It answers queries related to cricket. Project link

item.title: Customer Segmentation Analysis for Improving sales
item.description: It divides customers into various clusters. Clusters are formed based on features like age, gender ,income, expenditure of customer. Different marketing strategies are employed to different clusters to maximize profit. Project Link

item.title: Spam Classifier
item.description: It identifies messages which are spam in our inbox. It uses NLTK,TF-IDF, NGrams. It has an accuracy of 92%. Project Link
